posts.post_content:
Hello everyone, I've finally completed the T206 set - everyone except the "Big 6" (and hopefully 2 of the 6 in time).  That said, I do have a few I'd like to upgrade if possible and keep consistent with the set grade which ranges between 3 and 6.

I would be interested if you have the following in a 4 to 5 grade (SGC, PSA or BVG) at a reasonable (VCP ballpark) price.

* Al Shaw
* Hooks Wiltse (Portrait No Cap)
* George Mullen (Portrait Mullen Variation)
* Pat Moran
* Walter Johnson (Hands At Chest)
* Johnny Evers (Chicago on Shirt)

All of these I have, just in lower grades.  PM or Email - Sincere thanks for you help in completing to date, the last 25 or so all came from Net54 members!
Nice going Ed, quite an accomplishment.

Congratulations, Ed! 
You should come on the main board and take a bow instead of burying your great accomplishment in the BST bargain basement. Guys don't tame the monster every day.

i agree with david.
congrats but come on the main board and get the kudos you so richly deserve!!!

all the best,

barry

Thank you for the comments and feedback, I didn't know if/what the protocal dictated on set completion..?  There is a part of me that didn't feel like it was 100% complete given I don't have the Big 6.  Not sure how common that is?  

Also, trying to tie loose ends in upgrading the few I have in lower grade below a 3 or 40 - I guess I'll feel "more complete" when I do that .. which is why the post here.

Still, again, thank you for all the messages and help over the last couple years in completing!
Congrats to a truly nice guy in the hobby. Good luck on the others. By the way, there is a Wagner on ebay for a mere $335K, just in case you missed it!:D:D:D
